name: Artboard Document
summary: Learn about .ARTB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Artboard documents are saved in the Mac OS X package format. They include an Artboard .DRAWING file and other package files.

description: Vector drawing created by Artboard, a program used to make vector illustrations; may be a custom drawing or a drawing created from one of the various templates included with the software; can be exported to .PDF, .JPG, .PNG, and .TIF formats.
